name: Brand Guide Template
description:
This brand guidelines document serves as a template to put in your existing brand assets as well as to get you thinking about ways to extend or refine what already exists.


Learn more about using this brand guideline for your company: https://headway.io/blog/creating-brand-guidelines-to-improve-your-companys-identity.


“Brand guidelines” are the documented elements and rules that apply all aspects of your brand. It lives as a source of truth and holds designers and marketers accountable when creating new material. With everything that is created, designers and marketers should ask - “Does this hold true and align with what is stated in the brand guidelines?”


Brand guidelines keep everyone aligned on each aspect of your brand reputation and empowers your entire team to make decisions faster.
